column4: When I try to boot into Karmic, I get a blinking screen. The thing is, it's not just the display, it's the entire computer - when the screen isn't on, the computer doesn't respond the keyboard input
I could get it to start up in recovery mode, but I still have no idea how to fix it
also, gdm refuses to start up. It doesn't even give an error message, it just doesn't do anything.
